dt-api.name: cells().deselect()

type.returns: API instance that contains a reference to the deselected cells.
type.description: Deselect one or more cells in the table, based on the cells found by the `dt-api cells()` method.

dt-api.description: This method simply deselects the cells that have been found by the `dt-api cells()` selector method.

example.title: Deselect all cells which have a class of 'important'
